title.rendered: STEDI MC5 LED MOTORCYCLE DAY TIME RUNNING LIGHT (DRL)

content.rendered:
Motorcycle Day-time Running Light.

SEE & BE SEEN

With a raw 498 Lumens & beam distance of 50m, our MC-5 Daytime Running Light (DRL) are designed to ensure you get noticed by other road users.

IDEAL LIGHT VOLUME

Our MC5 DRL strikes the perfect level of brightness to ensure you remain conspicuous on the road while ensuring other roads users are not dazzled by overwhelming light pollution.

COMPACT & LIGHTWEIGHT

At a tiny overall housing diameter of only 43mm, these are lightweight and compact to ensure effortless and infinite mounting options.

DETAILS

A compact and lightweight DRL for your motorcycle, ensure you get noticed on the road by other road users.

BUILB MATERIAL USED

  • ADC12 Alloy Housing
  • Poly-Carb Reflectors
  • Lexan Primary Lens
  • Anodised Powder coat finish

ELECTRONICS

  • Reverse Polarity Protected
  • RFI and EMI Supressed Circuit
  • Shock Proof Circuit
  • 9 – 30v compatible
  • Thermal Management Reguation

SPECIFICATIONS

LED 5W CREE
POWER CONSUMPTION 0.3A @ 12v &  0.16A @ 24v
WATERPROOF RATING IP68
RAW LUMENS 498Lm
BEAM FLOOD
WEIGHT 0.080KG

 

WHAT’S IN THE BOX

  • STEDI MC5 LED DRL Light
  • Stainless U-Bracket
  • Stainless Side Arm Bracket
  • Mounting Hardware

excerpt.rendered: Please note: If product is out of stock, wait times for this product can be between approx. 1 – 4 weeks from date of order.
